problem_text_cn: 如图,点O在ABC内,且到三边的距离相等,若∠A=60°,则∠BOC的大小为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point O is within ABC and the distances to the three edges are equal. If ∠A = N_0, then the size of ∠BOC is ()
raw_answer: ∵O到三边的距离相等∴BO平分∠ABC,CO平分∠ACB∴∠OBC+∠OCB=\frac{1}{2}(∠ABC+∠ACB)=\frac{1}{2}(180^{°}-∠A)∵∠A=60°∠OBC+∠OCB=60°∴∠BOC=180°-(∠OBC+∠OCB)=180°-60°=120°故选B.
raw_comment: 本题考查了角平分线的性质,熟练掌握角平分线把一个角分成两个相等的角是解题的关键.
